author: Crunchyroll
description:
The lead voice actors of Solo Camping for Two, Daiki Hamano and Mizuki Niizaki, join us to talk about the real-life camping and cooking that prepared them for these roles. 

Welcome to The Anime Effect, the weekly podcast hosted by Crunchyroll's own in-house, resident anime experts – Nicholas Friedman, LeAlec Murray, and Leah President. The show is a lively mixture of roundtable news and discussion with Crunchyroll hosts and special guests as they debate hot topics, provide recommendations, and tackle fan questions. 

Have a question for The Anime Effect? Ask it here: https://got.cr/ae-ask


To bring your brand to life in this podcast, email podcastadsales@sonymusic.com.

Crunchyroll brings you the latest clips, openings, full episodes, and more from your favorite anime!

FREE 7-DAY CRUNCHYROLL TRIAL 🌟 https://got.cr/cc-7days

title: Solo Camping for Two Voice Actors Go Camping IRL?! | The Anime Effect #93

title: Is this... princess treatment?

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 13: Finally something to satiate her fists! Watch May I Ask for One Final Thing? on Crunchyroll! https://got.cr/cc-miafoft

ABOUT MAY I ASK FOR ONE FINAL THING?
Scarlet has put up with her fiancé’s bullying long enough. Not only is Second Prince Kyle arrogant and crude, but he suddenly called off their engagement during a ball. And if things couldn’t get any worse, he then accuses her of a crime she never committed. Fueled by betrayal, Scarlet unleashes her rage, giving the prince and his nobles a beatdown they’ll never forget.

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 3: Ryuko learns to work with Ryuuketsu! Watch Kill la Kill on Crunchyroll! https://got.cr/cc-klk

ABOUT KILL LA KILL
After 6 years since their collaboration on the ground breaking anime series, ‘Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann,’ Hiroyuki Imaishi and Kazuki Nakashima are back to shock the world!

Ryuko Matoi is a vagrant school girl traveling from place to place searching for clues to the truth behind her father’s death—the ‘woman with the scissor blade.’ The journey has led Ryuko to Honnouji Academy.
